text: Rolando Tucker is a fencer from Cuba. He got a gold medal in the team foil event at the 1996 Summer Olympics and won the 1994 World Championships. He was born on December 31, 1971.Rolando Tucker == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Cuba Category:Fencers Category:Sportspeople from Havana
title: Rolando Tucker
